summary: The diff implements most of the edit functionality requirements for the admin dashboard. Backend mutations for updating gift packs are implemented, frontend hooks and UI components support edit mode with pre-populated forms, and toast notifications follow the existing pattern. However, backend update functions for categories and coupons are missing (only placeholders exist), and there is no evidence of product edit functionality implementation.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend provides update functions for categories and coupons
missing_requirements.reason: The backend file (backend/main.mo) was truncated, but the frontend hooks (useCategoryMutation.ts and useCouponMutation.ts) contain placeholder comments indicating 'Backend updateCategory/updateCoupon method not yet implemented' and call createCategory/createCoupon instead of actual update functions.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add edit functionality to product sections in admin dashboard
missing_requirements.reason: REQ-5 acceptance criteria mentions 'product sections' but only gift packs, categories, and coupons are addressed in the diff. No evidence of a separate product edit functionality beyond gift packs.
